info.name: Angus King Bed
info.description: The Angus Bed is a prime place to fall back on, all day and all night. Simple and solidly crafted with a slim-but-sturdy metal frame and splayed legs, this low-profile platform bed is part of the collaborative collection from Blu Dot x Fab. This pared-down design plays nice with a variety of other bedroom furnishings and easily adapts with your evolving style. Itâ€™s ideal for urban apartment dwellers or anyone else short on space. Jump on it (not literally, please).
